BATTLE_NORMAL.name: Operation
BATTLE_NORMAL.description: Everyone has their weapons drawn. They're definitely not here to negotiate.

BATTLE_ELITE.name: Emergency Operation
BATTLE_ELITE.description: Some violence may well exceed your expectations, a very common occurrence.

BATTLE_BOSS.name: Treacherous Foe
BATTLE_BOSS.description: Criminals, ruffians, and the damned... You're in trouble.

SHOP.name: Cunning Merchant
SHOP.description: Not an ally, or an enemy. Some people like to sit on the fence.

REST.name: Safehouse
REST.description: Quiet, comfortable, and secluded from the world. It's time to take a break.

TREASURE.name: Supplies
TREASURE.description: A little bit of help for your journey.

ENTERTAINMENT.name: Leisure Entertainment
ENTERTAINMENT.description: All work and no play makes even clever Operators become dull.

shopDialogs: Good morning, good afternoon, and good night.
You give me the Originium, and I give you the goods. Don't worry too much about the details.
You can call me Mr. Goodenough.
Friends ought to take care of each other, right? So how 'bout buying something?
Rhodes Island is a business, and I am a businessman. See, we're peers.
This isn't called picking up the scraps. I just took the treasure that nobody else wanted.
You want to hear a story? Sure, my friend, but good tales don't come cheap.
Hah. What would you like purchase today, my friend?
I've seen a lot of interesting things, wandering in Terra's wastelands all these years.
shopRelicDialogs: Don't worry. Spending money can make the world turn 'round.
Don't be too high-maintenance, picking up all these scraps was very hard work.
A fully armed society must surely be a civilized society.
This little thing is equal parts worthless and terrifying...
What's this thing for? Good question, I don't know either.
Leithania holds many mystical relics, all of which are expensive.
Have you seen the Palace of the Sargon Kings? Splendid troves of silver and gold as far as the eye can see!
Travel tips? Stay away from Iberia.
An authentic Higashi katana can fetch sky-high prices.
shopTicketDialogs: You need manpower? I got you. No need to hesitate.
Where'd this thing come from? Maybe I picked it up somewhere? I forgot...
This is way cheaper than having your boss look all around for a messenger.
You guys at Rhodes Island have all sorts of weirdos, huh...
I know, everyone has their own affairs to attend to.
You need some help, but that help's not going to be free.
I heard that there's some form of transportation that can fly. Incredible.
If you want to find a fighter, the Sarkaz and Blacksteel are good options.
Life in the barrens is full of pain. It's not easy to survive.

recruit_ticket_double_1.name: Assault Co-op Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_double_1.usage: Recruit a Vanguard or Guard Operator.

recruit_ticket_double_2.name: Fortification Co-op Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_double_2.usage: Recruit a Defender or Supporter Operator.

recruit_ticket_double_3.name: Ranged Co-op Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_double_3.usage: Recruit a Medic or Sniper Operator.

recruit_ticket_double_4.name: Sabotage Co-op Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_double_4.usage: Recruit a Caster or Specialist Operator.

recruit_ticket_quad_melee.name: Frontline Corps Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_quad_melee.usage: Recruit a Vanguard, Guard, Defender, or Specialist Operator.

recruit_ticket_quad_ranged.name: Backline Corps Rec. Voucher
recruit_ticket_quad_ranged.usage: Recruit a Medic, Sniper, Supporter, or Caster Operator.

recruit_ticket_all_premium.name: Special HR Dispatch Letter
recruit_ticket_all_premium.usage: Recruit an Operator (Guaranteed to include an exclusive Temporary Recruitment Operator).

upgrade_ticket_all.name: Elite Logistics Rations Voucher
upgrade_ticket_all.usage: Promote an Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_5star.name: Combustible Building Mats.
upgrade_ticket_5star.usage: Promote a 5* or lower Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_pioneer.name: Vanguard Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_pioneer.usage: Promote a Vanguard Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_warrior.name: Guard Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_warrior.usage: Promote a Guard Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_tank.name: Defender Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_tank.usage: Promote a Defender Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_sniper.name: Sniper Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_sniper.usage: Promote a Sniper Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_caster.name: Caster Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_caster.usage: Promote a Caster Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_support.name: Supporter Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_support.usage: Promote a Supporter Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_medic.name: Medic Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_medic.usage: Promote a Medic Operator (Does not require Hope).

upgrade_ticket_special.name: Specialist Promotion Voucher
upgrade_ticket_special.usage: Promote a Specialist Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_b1.name: Leader Squad
relic_b1.usage: Temporarily gain 4 Objective HP at the beginning of each battle.

relic_b3.name: Support Squad
relic_b3.usage: Start with +20 Originium Ingots and +2 Hope.
relic_b3.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, earn a total of 150 Originium Ingots.

relic_b4.name: Spearhead Squad
relic_b4.usage: Start with 1 Objective HP; All Operators gain +15% ATK and +15% Max HP.
relic_b4.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 10 Objective HP remaining.

relic_b5.name: Tactical Assault Operative
relic_b5.usage: When recruiting a 4* or above Vanguard or Guard Operator, that Operator is automatically Promoted.
relic_b5.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 5 Vanguard or Guard Operators.

relic_b6.name: Tactical Fortification Operative
relic_b6.usage: When recruiting a 4* or above Defender or Supporter Operator, that Operator is automatically Promoted.
relic_b6.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 5 Defender or Supporter Operators.

relic_b7.name: Tactical Ranged Operative
relic_b7.usage: When recruiting a 4* or above Medic or Sniper Operator, that Operator is automatically Promoted.
relic_b7.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 5 Medic or Sniper Operators.

relic_b8.name: Tactical Destruction Operative
relic_b8.usage: When recruiting a 4* or above Caster or Specialist Operator, that Operator is automatically Promoted.
relic_b8.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 5 Specialist or Caster Operators.

relic_1.name: Ursus Big Bread
relic_1.description: Food from Ursus with a strong, fermented taste. Quite sour.

relic_2.name: Dried Cactus Chips
relic_2.description: This strange, dessicated plant doesn't look tasty at all, but the people of Bolívar often immerse it in water before drinking.

relic_3.name: Dried Yucca Fruit
relic_3.description: The banana yucca is a fruit that grows in arid environments. It has an excellent taste and is easier to preserve after drying.
relic_3.unlockCondDesc: In a single 'Originium Slug Race' event, place at least 10 bets in a row.

relic_4.name: Caravan Boxed Meal
relic_4.description: This convenient meal sold by intercity Columbian caravans is deep-fried, loaded with calories, and tastes great... but isn't very healthy.
relic_4.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 50 Operators (excluding starting Operators).

relic_5.name: Half Can of Sandworms
relic_5.description: 'These chopped sandworms are soaked in olive oil and exude a natural fragrance!' That's just what the ads say, so don't take it at face value. Urgh...

relic_6.name: Victorian Rations
relic_6.description: A former Victorian sergeant described this as such: 'Huge portions, hard to wash down, but won't kill you.'

relic_7.name: Outdated Map
relic_7.description: A worn and weathered map depicting the geographic features of the surrounding area, possibly with incorrect descriptions and unaccounted-for cliffs.

relic_8.name: Monocular
relic_8.description: This brass monocular is full of medieval flair, but you won't be able to see far with it.

relic_9.name: Hologram Sandbox
relic_9.description: A complete set of a strange sandbox hologram-projection terrain simulation device. For whatever reason, all living creatures are projected in a pink color. Don't touch the eye on the top of the box.

relic_10.name: Sleeping Bag
relic_10.description: A sleeping bag intended for use by one person. Two is doable, but a tight squeeze. Extremely inadvisable.

relic_11.name: Tattered Tent
relic_11.description: A tent thrown together using twigs and a tarp. Looks like it'll collapse the moment the wind blows. The materials were scrounged on the spot.

relic_12.name: Large Sami 'Candle'
relic_12.description: Find a log, cut four notches into it, and you've got yourself a practical temporary campfire. Only someone from Sami would call this thing a 'candle.'
relic_12.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 20 Operators (excluding starting Operators).

relic_13.name: Rabbit Hut
relic_13.description: This Rim Billiton shed was quickly assembled using leftover industrial materials but is good enough to protect you from the elements. Having that said, the Cautus design is all too evident.

relic_14.name: Noise Generator
relic_14.description: Columbia's latest industrial product, commonly seen attached to mobile trailers in small and medium-sized towns. Very cost effective, but extremely loud. Way too loud.

relic_15.name: Potted Pea Plant
relic_15.description: These quirky Columbian potted peas are suitable for decoration or for growing food. They may even have some other uses.
relic_15.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 50 Hope.

relic_16.name: Gardening Harvest
relic_16.description: Originally, this was probably just an ordinary potted plant for use in a public area, but after passing through the hands of Perfumer, Suzuran, and Flamebringer, it has become something a bit more... complex.
relic_16.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 150 Hope.

relic_17.name: Charred Meat Skewer
relic_17.description: A mass of flesh and bone charred beyond repair due to someone's woefully inadequate cooking. Pretty much looks like a murder weapon.

relic_18.name: Compressed Sugar Cube
relic_18.description: Nobody knows just how this supercompressed foodstuff is produced. It is extremely hard and can even be used as a building material. More lethal than your typical failed cooking.

relic_19.name: Crate of Explosive Building Materials
relic_19.description: Rhodes Island's portable basic building materials kits are limited in quantity. If lost, please reapply for redistribution. Please assemble according to the instructions; otherwise, the heating pack may explode.
relic_19.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 8 Hope remaining.

relic_20.name: Exquisite Platter of Jewels
relic_20.description: The field of candidates for Sargon's next crown prince is always vast, which makes the annual city-state tributes a contentious matter. It's not just a matter of succession; deciding which of the myriad banquets to attend can also be troublesome.
relic_20.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 60 Max Hope.

relic_21.name: Pure Gold Expedition
relic_21.description: The regent departed from the wastelands, and markets rose from beneath her dress like sprouts budding in the spring. The road of prosperity connected high mountains and dense forests, following her until she disappeared beyond the cliffs overlooking the western waves. —Ancient Sargon Fairy Tale
relic_21.usage: Hope +4, Squad Size Limit +1, Deployment Limit +1
relic_21.unlockCondDesc: Reach a Squad Size Limit of 13 at any point.

relic_22.name: Antique Coins
relic_22.description: An ancient, rusty coin, weathered to the point where one can no longer identify its age. Things like these are all too common throughout Terra's barrens.

relic_23.name: Demonic Golden Statue
relic_23.description: A mysterious golden sculpture previously fought over by the black-hearted Columbian mining companies and the local rebels of Sargon. Quite the strange design.

relic_24.name: Blood Diamond
relic_24.description: An expensive gemstone with a magnificent, sanguine luster, produced in Bolívar. In its shadow lies a cruel, unbearable past.

relic_25.name: Small Fortuna Statue
relic_25.description: Please cease posting photos of other Operators without permission.
relic_25.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 50 Originium Ingots remaining.

relic_26.name: 'Roar' Pendant
relic_26.description: An amulet circulated among a few members of the L.G.D. who don't take their work very seriously. Said to be able to double one's bonuses.
relic_26.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 15 Originium Ingots remaining.

relic_27.name: Beagle's Cookie
relic_27.usage: Immediately Promote an Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_28.name: Cup of Black Tea
relic_28.description: Miss Ceylon's craftsmanship is quite popular, and having some exquisite afternoon tea after training is not out of the question.
relic_28.usage: Immediately Promote 2 Operators (Does not require Hope).
relic_28.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, promote a total of 10 Operators (excluding starting Operators).

relic_29.name: Antique Casting
relic_29.description: 'Harken  The forge of the sky  Awaits five earthborn metals' ...Even though it can be used for all kinds of work, nobody understands its exact mechanism.
relic_29.usage: Immediately Promote 3 Operators (Does not require Hope).
relic_29.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, promote a total of 25 Operators (excluding starting Operators).

relic_30.name: Regional Action Plan
relic_30.description: Rhodes Island has established dedicated offices in every important hub area. The messengers are doing what they can to weave a fragile web across this land.

relic_31.name: Comprehensive Operation File
relic_31.description: A vessel sailing upon the land, like treading upon thin ice. Remember to always expand your worldview.

relic_32.name: Secret HR Letter
relic_32.description: '■■■ gave this to you? Guess there's no problem then.'

relic_33.name: Draft of a Speech
relic_33.description: She was a little nervous, a little worried, but still remained resolute. When the microphone was turned on, her long ears quivered slightly.
relic_33.usage: All Operators cost -2 Hope to recruit.
relic_33.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 15 Operators.

relic_34.name: Assault Co-op Expansion
relic_34.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_34.usage: Vanguard Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_34.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Vanguard Operators.

relic_35.name: Assault Co-op Reinforcements
relic_35.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_35.usage: Guard Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_35.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Guard Operators.

relic_36.name: Fortification Co-op Expansion
relic_36.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_36.usage: Defender Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_36.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Defender Operators.

relic_37.name: Fortification Co-op Reinforcements
relic_37.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_37.usage: Supporter Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_37.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Supporter Operators.

relic_38.name: Ranged Co-op Expansion
relic_38.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_38.usage: Medic Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_38.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 3 Medic Operators.

relic_39.name: Ranged Co-op Reinforcements
relic_39.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_39.usage: Sniper Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_39.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Sniper Operators.

relic_40.name: Sabotage Co-op Expansion
relic_40.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_40.usage: Caster Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_40.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Caster Operators.

relic_41.name: Sabotage Co-op Reinforcements
relic_41.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
relic_41.usage: Specialist Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
relic_41.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 4 Specialist Operators.

relic_42.name: Darkened Signal Light
relic_42.description: This is the only way for most workers of Rim Billiton to convey information in the total darkness of the wilderness nights.
relic_42.usage: 15% chance to drop an additional Rec. Voucher after battle (Effect does not stack).

relic_43.name: Old-Fashioned Telegraph
relic_43.description: An old telegraph. The entire set is bulky and heavy.
relic_43.usage: 25% chance to drop an additional Rec. Voucher after battle (Effect does not stack).

relic_44.name: Wireless Communicator
relic_44.description: A remote communication device powered by Originium. As the recon operator reminded you, this piece of equipment is expensive and complex, so please handle it with care.
relic_44.usage: 35% chance to drop an additional Rec. Voucher after battle (Effect does not stack).

relic_45.name: Lucky Coin
relic_45.description: A coin picked up from Rhodes Island. If you find one, you're sure to be able to find many more.
relic_45.usage: Gain +2 Originium Ingots upon entering a noncombat node.
relic_45.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 40 non-combat nodes.

relic_46.name: Snowsant's Hand-Drawn Flyer
relic_46.description: Can someone take her out for a meal? She's been starving for two days. As I said, just head down to the cafeteria. It's not like they'll deny you rations...
relic_46.usage: Gain +3 Originium Ingots upon entering a noncombat node.
relic_46.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 100 non-combat nodes.

relic_47.name: Istina's Book list
relic_47.description: It's just a list of Istina's books. Doesn't offer you any profound information, but you might be able to learn how to make her favorite snack.
relic_47.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 10 battles.

relic_48.name: Instructor's Beloved Whip
relic_48.description: Are Rhodes Island's instructors required to use this kind of weapon?!
relic_48.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 50 battles.

relic_49.name: Transporter-Type Meebo
relic_49.description: The 'Great Meebo Monument' is covered with the codenames of its compatriots, but it knows no joy or sorrow. It simply wants to work.

relic_50.name: Sarkaz Supervisor's Whistle
relic_50.description: A whistle stolen by a certain Sarkaz mercenary, originally property of a Sarkaz foreman. Even they had to cover their ears when blowing on it.

relic_51.name: Burdenbeast
relic_51.description: You saw a depressed burdenbeast, and for whatever reason, that also made you depressed.
relic_51.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 2nd Floor, 'Honey Biscuit Mountain Range.'

relic_52.name: $trange $unglasses
relic_52.description: When you wear it, it's as if the entire wealth of the Columbian music industry is revolving around you.
relic_52.usage: Shop vendors charge -50% Originium Ingots for their goods.
relic_52.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, spend a total of 200 Originium Ingots at shops.

relic_53.name: Fragmentation Mine
relic_53.description: Fragmentation mines planted on Rhodes Island have one of two functions, depending on who set it up. NO— PLANTING— EXPLOSIVES— IN— THE— HALLWAY—
relic_53.usage: Temporarily gain 1 Objective HP at the beginning of each battle.
relic_53.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, lose a total of 50 Objective HP.

relic_54.name: 'Self-Defense Handbook'
relic_54.description: Its complete title is, 'Handbook of Self-Defense When Traveling to the City-States of Other Countries Surrounding Laterano and the Zones Between Them.' You can read it, but you can't learn anything from it.
relic_54.usage: Temporarily gain 2 Objective HP at the beginning of each battle.
relic_54.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, lose a total of 125 Objective HP.

relic_55.name: Hibiscus's Healthy Meal
relic_55.description: Physically healthy, but mentally unhealthy. Eating something like this takes the fight right out of you.

relic_56.name: Livestock Excrement
relic_56.description: Something like this is effective for sapping the morale of your enemies. Help...
relic_56.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Leader Squad' and complete your adventure.

relic_57.name: Abyssal Wyrdmask
relic_57.description: An eldritch mask not belonging to any culture you're familiar with that is capable of making people lose their will to fight... and unconsciously fall into a state of deep contemplation.

relic_58.name: Godmother's Token
relic_58.description: A laurel of bones, the token of a Sicilian noblewoman. This symbol of order will smooth the turbulance of all desires, for conflict is not allowed. Genuine or counterfeit, it still demands you to kneel.

relic_59.name: Nail File
relic_59.description: Sneakily pry loose the enemy's equipment.

relic_60.name: Rickety Trap
relic_60.description: A trap commonly used by a violent organization based in Terra's barrens, 'Rusthammer.' 'We kill people and animals alike.'
relic_60.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Gathering Squad' and complete your adventure.

relic_61.name: Acid Originium Slug
relic_61.description: A chilling fact of the battlefield: Small or juvenile Originium slugs can be used as lethal throwing objects. But please don't...!

relic_63.name: Anthology of Anonymous Poems
relic_63.description: 'The shards of the wine glass sung within my flesh, and fresh blood climbed between my fingers towards my spine. As I lapped up the sharp, crystalline brilliance, light began to flow from my viscera.'

relic_64.name: Deteriorated Tissue
relic_64.description: Very dense connective tissue found in the endless icy expanses north of Sami. This project is to be terminated immediately. Effective now.
relic_64.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Support Squad' and complete your adventure.

relic_65.name: 'The Whisperer in Darknight'
relic_65.description: A black vinyl. DO. NOT. TOUCH. IT.

relic_66.name: 'The Silence'
relic_66.description: A painting that depicts the greatest disaster in Iberian history. Its brushstrokes, colors, and images are all meaningless. 'The Ægir know. The Ægir know. The Ægir know.'

relic_67.name: Small Yellow Helmet
relic_67.description: This yellow polymer safety helmet has the words, 'Produce Safely' written on its back. Are these words meant for the people behind the wearer...?

relic_68.name: Trench Sandbag
relic_68.description: Can be used to quickly erect temporary fortifications. Remember, temporary.
relic_68.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Spearhead Squad' and complete your adventure.

relic_69.name: Slash-Resistant Fiber Vest
relic_69.description: A set of basic but very heavy armor issued by the Victorian Mounted Police. Courier said that for whatever reason, he saw similar equipment in Kjerag...

relic_70.name: Old Steam Armor
relic_70.description: Even this old, outdated steam armor seems to carry with it the resplendence of when the Victorian monarchs cast their glory across half the world.

relic_71.name: 'How to Throw Down'
relic_71.description: A recording of the warcry of a large number of Ursusians. Very intimidating.
relic_71.usage: All friendly melee units have +15% ATK.

relic_72.name: 'One-Armed Chainsaw'
relic_72.description: A novel from Yen, chronicling the revenge story of the One-Armed Chainsaw. There seem to be over a dozen sequels.
relic_72.usage: All friendly melee units have +18% ATK.
relic_72.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Thousand Roads,' when you have exactly 0 Originium Ingots.

relic_73.name: Gear-type Exoskeleton
relic_73.description: This exoskeleton provides mechanical assistance to save the time and effort of its wearer... or just to do other stuff. Have they never considered the issue of powering it?
relic_73.usage: All friendly melee units have +25% ATK.

relic_74.name: Corroded Silver Lance
relic_74.description: A lance that can pierce mountains and lakes, accompanied by the trampling of hooves that can disperse gathered clouds. Fireworks and advertisements have dulled everyone's memories, but they are still out there. They will appear.
relic_74.usage: All friendly melee units have +35% ATK.

relic_75.name: Pressurized Cylinder
relic_75.description: A pressurized vessel with compressed inert gas. Be sure to pay attention to whether the pressure gauge's readout is normal.
relic_75.usage: All friendly ranged units have +15% ATK.

relic_76.name: Superelastic Alloy Spring
relic_76.description: High-quality springs with several times the elasticity of normal springs. Regardless of how you use them, be careful not to hurt yourself.
relic_76.usage: All friendly ranged units have +18% ATK.
relic_76.unlockCondDesc: Clear the battle, 'Rusthammer Battle,' without losing any Objective HP.

relic_77.name: Damaged Revolver Cylinder
relic_77.description: She never capitulated, even after enduring countless trials and tribulations. Her muzzle belched tongues of flame that burned like an angry sun, and the glow above her head was brighter than the daylight itself. Buried here is Outcast, our friend.
relic_77.usage: All friendly ranged units have +25% ATK.

relic_78.name: Necklace of the Presence
relic_78.description: Faith hangs ten centimeters above your heart, spoken words flow into your blood, and bullets slide into your magazine.
relic_78.usage: All friendly ranged units have +35% ATK.

relic_79.name: Noxious Healing Powder
relic_79.description: 'Dried and ground Ander roots and Brocc flowers can be used topically to treat injuries.' —'Rhodes Island Wilderness Survival Guide'

relic_80.name: Noxious Hemostatic Agent
relic_80.description: 'After fermentation, the body fluids of this Originium slug can be used to stop bleeding.' —'Rhodes Island Wilderness Survival Guide'
relic_80.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Assault Operative' and complete your adventure.

relic_81.name: First Aid Kit
relic_81.description: '...Please use antibiotics and ethanol additives under the supervision of professionals...' —Rim Billiton Production Safety Manual

relic_82.name: Chalky Treatment Needle
relic_82.description: '...Improve the totipotence of individual cells to alleviate pain and discomfort...' —Instruction manual on Saria's desk

relic_84.name: Auxiliary Stun Device
relic_84.description: Gavial wants to alleviate pain by 'putting the patient in so much pain that they can't feel pain anymore,' which is simply not good.
relic_84.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Fortification Operative' and complete your adventure.

relic_85.name: Bloody Chainsaw
relic_85.description: Very scary, just like a prop from a horror movie. Blaze used it to slice up a watermelon yesterday.

relic_86.name: Another Rivet
relic_86.description: A rivet that can be found just about anywhere. 'Friend, why are your hands oily again? When'd you have time to go sand your horns? Why are there rocks growing on your skin? Why aren't you saying anything?'

relic_87.name: Activated Dust
relic_87.description: The waste from Terra's Originium industrial production is extremely dangerous. Please dispose of it properly. A~choo!

relic_88.name: Originium Spotlight
relic_88.description: A spotlight that derives its illumination from stimulating Originium activity. Harmful to a person's body.

relic_89.name: Originium Zone Generator
relic_89.description: Originium crystals are planted in advance to ensure that the Caster team can complete their mission. This form of combat...

relic_90.name: Ownerless Saxophone
relic_90.description: Its owner is dead. There was once a caster who never ascended the Spire, yet had the ability to make the skies sing. Long has it waited for the time when Leithania's Arts would be free once again. The wait yet continues.

relic_92.name: Small Handmade Bag
relic_92.description: Shamare and Bibeak both had a part in making this.

relic_93.name: *Piddling* Overtime Pay
relic_93.description: The boss appears extremely reluctant to even give a small raise to boost employee motivation, seriously. So, this definitely couldn't be the boss of Penguin Logistics.
relic_93.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Thousand Roads,' with no fewer than 15 Objective HP remaining.

relic_94.name: Closure's Mercy
relic_94.description: An elusive voucher that only appears when resources are abundant. When this happens, Closure allows even operators to splurge in her shop. Well, the amount is hardly enough to allow for splurging.

relic_95.name: 'Fluorescent Lamp'
relic_95.description: I was born a Lateranan. Err, no, I meant, I was a Lateranan from the moment I uttered my first word.

relic_96.name: Vanilla Soda
relic_96.description: Bolívar's cheap specialty drink dates back hundreds of years. It is mixed with a variety of spices, and is known for not being very good.
relic_96.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.2/s.

relic_97.name: Forte Energy Drink
relic_97.description: 'What do you think the reason is why Bison can catch up to Texas on a bicycle?'
relic_97.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.25/s.
relic_97.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Ranged Operative' and complete your adventure.

relic_98.name: Pepper Mom
relic_98.description: A special beverage that comes from a city-state located to the southwest of Yen. It is spicy and pungent, and said to double as a condiment.
relic_98.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.35/s.

relic_99.name: Braintet
relic_99.description: A new type of energy draught developed by Parasol Pharmaceuticals. It's sugar free, has a minty taste, and has no side effects.
relic_99.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.5/s.

relic_100.name: Barrens Tequila
relic_100.description: A cheap distilled spirit originally produced in Bolívar. It has a strong taste and is widely praised by Columbia's explorers.
relic_100.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 3.5s.

relic_101.name: Captain Morgan's Wine
relic_101.description: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria's bustling cities, it is now discontinued.
relic_101.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 3s.
relic_101.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Destruction Operative' and complete your adventure.

relic_102.name: Water of Life
relic_102.description: The strongest Ursus liquors go straight to one's head, but it's said that the healthy Ursusian adult can down several bottles.
relic_102.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 2.5s.

relic_103.name: Royal Liqueur
relic_103.description: The fine wines of the extinct country, Gaul, have now become expensive, prime treasures for collectors. The place of production is now a part of Leithania, but the technique has been lost.
relic_103.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 1.5s.

relic_104.name: Blunt Claws - Advancement
relic_104.description: Plant a great stone within the waters. Split the waves and part the fog.
relic_104.usage: Vanguard Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_105.name: Blunt Claws - Training
relic_105.description: A formidable set of equipment to provide strength, an indomitable heart to press forward bravely.
relic_105.usage: Immediately Promote a Vanguard Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_106.name: Blunt Claws - Burst
relic_106.description: He's already done all the reserve squad's work for them. What else do you expect?
relic_106.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 2 times.

relic_107.name: Blunt Claws - Proficiency
relic_107.description: As an operator who often enters the battlefield before anyone else, you cannot fathom what they have been through.
relic_107.usage: The SP Cost of Vanguard Operators' skills is decreased by -35%.

relic_108.name: Blunt Claws - Inspiration
relic_108.description: It's just a strategic retreat. That way, you can see what they look like before penetrating the enemy.
relic_108.usage: The Redeployment Time of Vanguard Operators is reduced by -50%.
relic_108.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 6 times.

relic_109.name: Blunt Claws - Mastery
relic_109.description: 'When the darkly-clad enemies rushed towards me, there were only four words on my mind — they are done for.'
relic_109.usage: Vanguard Operators have +50% ATK and DEF
relic_109.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 12 times.

relic_110.name: Bend Spears - Advancement
relic_110.description: The soldiers stepped onto the battlefield, drew their blades, and met in battle.
relic_110.usage: Guard Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% Max HP.

relic_111.name: Bend Spears - Training
relic_111.description: Some people use swords because they don't know how to use crossbows or Arts. Others use swords because that's all they need.
relic_111.usage: Immediately Promote a Guard Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_112.name: Bend Spears - Acuity
relic_112.description: 'This is the 7th blade you've broken this month.' 'But I cut down eight enemies this month.'
relic_112.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'A Toaster' event 2 times.

relic_113.name: Bend Spears - Bloodbath
relic_113.description: Soldiers who get bolder as time passes are rare. Most need some form of psychological counseling to alleviate the trauma of war.
relic_113.usage: Guard Operators restore 2 SP after each attack.

relic_114.name: Bend Spears - Army of One
relic_114.description: One does not need to don heavy armor or hold up a shield to resist enemy attacks. Oftentimes, the best defense is to quickly eliminate those that would harm you.
relic_114.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'A Toaster' event 6 times.

relic_115.name: Bend Spears - Deathmatch
relic_115.description: I wouldn't really recommend learning those skills from Blaze.
relic_115.usage: Guard Operators have -40% DEF, but gain +40% ATK and +30 ASPD.
relic_115.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'A Toaster' event 12 times.

relic_116.name: Iron Guard - Advancement
relic_116.description: The shieldbearers formed a mountain range and became the earth. What they fight against are not enemies of flesh and blood. They fight against fate and injustice.
relic_116.usage: Defender Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% Max HP.

relic_117.name: Iron Guard - Training
relic_117.description: Scars symbolize glory, but who will remember the soldiers who were cut a bit too deeply?
relic_117.usage: Immediately Promote a Defender Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_118.name: Iron Guard - Invasion
relic_118.description: Defensive actions for the sake of teammates or strategic purposes often make people forget about their original aggressiveness.
relic_118.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 2 times.

relic_119.name: Iron Guard - Tranquility
relic_119.description: 'Is there anyone who can remain in formation under a bombing of that scale?' 'Standing in formation? He moved a few steps forward.'
relic_119.usage: Defender Operators have +25% DEF and +50% Max HP.

relic_120.name: Iron Guard - Advance
relic_120.description: In exchange for an opportunity to attack, the shattered ranks made one more advance.
relic_120.usage: Defender Operators have -1 Block (will not be reduced below 1), but gain +40% ATK and +40 ASPD.
relic_120.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 6 times.

relic_121.name: Iron Guard - Impenetrable
relic_121.description: Every blow they endure will turn into anger and be returned severalfold.
relic_121.usage: Defender Operators restore 2 SP after being attacked.
relic_121.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 12 times.

relic_122.name: Fatal Bolts - Advancement
relic_122.description: Load, aim, and fire. Destruction arrives as scheduled.
relic_122.usage: Sniper Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_123.name: Fatal Bolts - Precision
relic_123.description: In an era when Originium Arts were not as robust as they are now, Yen had a saying, 'a pierced willow leaf from a hundred paces,' to praise others for their mastery of archery.
relic_123.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Lost Colossus' boss 1 time.

relic_124.name: Fatal Bolts - Training
relic_124.description: 'Either you learn to control your ignition, or you learn to discern your target. Got it?'
relic_124.usage: Immediately Promote a Sniper Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_125.name: Fatal Bolts - Synergy
relic_125.description: The more intimate a sniper is with her weapon, the less likely she is to be betrayed by it.
relic_125.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Sniper Operators by +0.5/s.

relic_126.name: Fatal Bolts - Crossfire
relic_126.description: The dense crossfire also exposes snipers to great danger. The next battle boils down to a game of vision.
relic_126.usage: Sniper Operators have -40% HP, but gain +40% ATK.
relic_126.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Lost Colossus' boss 2 times.

relic_127.name: Fatal Bolts - Divine Speed
relic_127.description: It is said that the legendary archer of ancient Victoria can almost shoot a continuous stream of arrows.
relic_127.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Lost Colossus' boss 4 times.

relic_128.name: Broken Wand - Advancement
relic_128.description: Let Arts dance around your fingertips. Call the wind and rain, unravel reality, and achieve your grand goals.
relic_128.usage: Caster Operators have -3 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_129.name: Broken Wand - Training
relic_129.description: 'After watching the 'performance' of certain casters, I decided to quietly put away the Leithanien textbook.'
relic_129.usage: Immediately Promote a Caster Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_130.name: Broken Wand - Arts Weaving
relic_130.description: Those who gaze up at the great spires in Leithania often see some strange or even celestial phenomena.
relic_130.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Jetman' boss 1 time.

relic_131.name: Broken Wand - Chanting
relic_131.description: Though the relationship between music and Arts is marvelous indeed, umm, this is not an excuse for some peoples' tone-deafness.

relic_132.name: Broken Wand - Concentration
relic_132.description: 'When a caster intends to go all out, they will display a completely different temperament — even if we're talking about something like Miss Skyfire's grumpiness.'
relic_132.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Caster Operators by +0.4/s.
relic_132.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Jetman' boss 2 times.

relic_133.name: Broken Wand - Malediction
relic_133.description: It is virtually impossible to identify when the Sarkaz first encountered Originium, and the origins of these ancient Arts have long been separated from actual reality and common sense.
relic_133.usage: Caster Operators have -40% HP, but deal +70% Arts damage.
relic_133.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Jetman' boss 4 times.

relic_134.name: Stalwart Aid - Advancement
relic_134.description: Whenever you're 'almost done' with a task, what you need at that moment is someone to help you with the 'almost' part.
relic_134.usage: Supporter Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_135.name: Stalwart Aid - Training
relic_135.description: Their tactics are always diverse and colorful.
relic_135.usage: Immediately Promote a Supporter Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_136.name: Stalwart Aid - Secondary Front
relic_136.description: 'Um, I can understand the derivatives of combining mechanics with Originium Arts, but there might be something else...'
relic_136.usage: Units summoned by Supporter Operators have +50% ATK.
relic_136.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Forsaken One' boss 1 time.

relic_137.name: Stalwart Aid - Diligence
relic_137.description: Operators tend to give it their all, even to tasks that might seem trivial. The reality is, those tasks are not trivial at all.
relic_137.usage: The SP Cost of Supporter Operators' skills is decreased by -40%.

relic_138.name: Stalwart Aid - Demoralize
relic_138.description: There are many ways to weaken an enemy's offensive capabilities: corroding their weapons, psychological warfare, increasing their weight, and... giving them a stomachache.
relic_138.usage: Enemies within the attack range of Supporter Operators have -15% ATK.
relic_138.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Forsaken One' boss 2 times.

relic_139.name: Stalwart Aid - Counter-Arts
relic_139.description: There are many ways to weaken an enemy's defensive capabilities: positional devices, armor-stripping Arts, marking weak points, and... giving them a stomachache.
relic_139.usage: Enemies within the attack range of Supporter Operators have -20% DEF and -20% RES.
relic_139.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Forsaken One' boss 4 times.

relic_140.name: Healer's Path - Advancement
relic_140.description: The desire to save lives is a virtue that mankind must applaud, for that is the support that keeps us alive.
relic_140.usage: Medic Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_141.name: Healer's Path - Training
relic_141.description: When the day comes when everyone is a doctor and can even cure the disease known as life, we will no longer need doctors.
relic_141.usage: Immediately Promote a Medic Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_142.name: Healer's Path - Self-Treating
relic_142.description: Who says healers can't heal themselves? They simply pop some pills before continuing to help others.
relic_142.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Medic Operators by +0.3/s.
relic_142.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Rusthammer Warrior' boss 1 time.

relic_143.name: Healer's Path - Potency
relic_143.description: Nobody else dared to attempt such a radical treatment — except Warfarin. She never made a single mistake.

relic_144.name: Healer's Path - Keen Hands
relic_144.description: Compared to the feat of snatching a life from the grip of death, what is three days of coma afterwards?
relic_144.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Rusthammer Warrior' boss 3 times.

relic_145.name: Healer's Path - Restore Sanity
relic_145.description: Reinforce your thinking. In the domain of your mind, make even every weed impregnable.
relic_145.usage: Allied units within the attack range of Medic Operators gain Resistance.
relic_145.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, defeat the 'Rusthammer Warrior' boss 6 times.

relic_146.name: Rusted Blade - Advancement
relic_146.description: There may be many means, but only one end.
relic_146.usage: Specialist Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP.

relic_147.name: Rusted Blade - Training
relic_147.description: When conducting live combat drills with Specialist Operators, please be prepared to be 'beaten up thoroughly before you are prepared.'
relic_147.usage: Immediately Promote a Specialist Operator (Does not require Hope).

relic_148.name: Rusted Blade - Execution
relic_148.description: Projekt Red has a knife. She has a knife.

relic_149.name: Rusted Blade - Isolation
relic_149.description: The director of S.W.E.E.P. does not have any mission participation records. *None*.
relic_149.usage: Specialist Operators have +40% ATK and DEF

relic_150.name: Rusted Blade - No Man's Land
relic_150.description: Some operators have very peculiar combat methods. Don't make a fuss over how many times you see them, or how many of them you see.
relic_150.usage: The Redeployment Time of Vanguard Operators is reduced by -35%.
relic_150.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, place at least 15 bets in the 'Originium Slug Race' event.

relic_151.name: Rusted Blade - Overwhelm
relic_151.description: Terrain is one aspect of battle... That's all I can say.
relic_151.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, place at least 50 bets in the 'Originium Slug Race' event.

relic_152.name: Assault Co-op - Sharp Blade
relic_152.description: Use the sharpest spear to strike the hardest shield. I guarantee you that the shield will break first, trust me.
relic_152.usage: Increases the ATK of Vanguard and Guard Operators by +8% for each Vanguard or Guard Operator in the combat squad.

relic_153.name: Assault Co-op - Skirmish
relic_153.description: A sophisticated blocking technique is essential to protecting one's body.
relic_153.usage: Increases the DEF of Vanguard and Guard Operators by +8% for each Vanguard or Guard Operator in the combat squad.

relic_154.name: Fortification Co-op - Phalanx
relic_154.description: Like a huge ship running over rubble.
relic_154.usage: Increases the ATK of Defender and Supporter Operators by +8% for each Defender or Supporter Operator in the combat squad.

relic_155.name: Fortification Co-op - Resolution
relic_155.description: Use the hardest shield to block the sharpest spear. I guarantee you that the spear will break first, trust me.
relic_155.usage: Increases the DEF of Defender and Supporter Operators by +8% for each Defender or Supporter Operator in the combat squad.

relic_156.name: Ranged Co-op - Remote Strike
relic_156.description: If you can solve the problem from a reasonable distance, why do you have to literally butt heads?
relic_156.usage: Increases the ATK of Medic and Sniper Operators by +8% for each Medic or Sniper Operator in the combat squad.

relic_157.name: Ranged Co-op - Assassination
relic_157.description: Can't tell friends from foes at this distance? Unload a volley at them then. The enemies are the ones that failed to avoid it.
relic_157.usage: Increases the ASPD of Medic and Sniper Operators by +6 for each Medic or Sniper Operator in the combat squad.

relic_158.name: Sabotage Co-op - Elimination
relic_158.usage: Increases the ATK of Caster and Specialist Operators by +8% for each Caster or Specialist Operator in the combat squad.

relic_159.name: Sabotage Co-op - Suppression
relic_159.description: Don't worry about your accuracy. Take enough shots, and you're guaranteed to land something!
relic_159.usage: Increases the ASPD of Caster and Specialist Operators by +6 for each Caster or Specialist Operator in the combat squad.

relic_160.name: Psychedelic Treasure Map
relic_160.description: Someone wrote the name he saw in his dream on this treasure map. Judging from the coordinates, this 'city' seems to be a forest of banana trees?
relic_160.usage: Immediately adds +2 Originium Ingots and +1 Hope.

relic_161.name: Bloodstained Flyer
relic_161.description: Filled with objects and places that only appear in fairy tales and nursery rhymes. On the other side of the Candy Castle. The boy of the Honey Windmill. What does it all mean?
relic_161.usage: Immediately adds +22 Originium Ingot, and changes your adventure towards a different ending.

relic_162.name: Glorious Craftsman Bag
relic_162.description: Only when drinking cheap booze does Mechanist remember that he is flesh and blood, not the embodiment of a physical property.
relic_162.usage: Guard and Sniper Operators have +16% ATK, but Supporter and Caster Operators have -8% ATK.

relic_163.name: Logos's Bone Pen
relic_163.description: Every stroke made by this crazed but masterful Sarkaz caster can be considered some form of Originium Arts. Watching is prohibited. Questions are prohibited. Understanding is prohibited.
relic_163.usage: Supporter and Caster Operators have +16% ATK, but Guard and Sniper Operators have -8% ATK.

relic_164.name: Vessel of Unlimited Refills
relic_164.description: Just pour in water, and this cup will produce an infinite supply of fizzy soda! What an ingenious invention! You've never seen anything like it before.
relic_164.usage: Gain +1 Hope upon entering a noncombat node.

relic_165.name: Left Coconut Shell
relic_165.description: Neatly printed upon the coconut shell are the following words, 'Fight on, my friend. If you cannot face the suffering of life, then life itself will lose its meaning.'
relic_165.usage: All Operators have +6 DP Cost, but gain +8% ATK, DEF, and Max HP.

relic_166.name: Right Coconut Shell
relic_166.description: Neatly printed upon the coconut shell are the following words, 'Running is a tactic in its own right, and proficient use of it is a shortcut to success.'
relic_166.usage: All Operators have -35% Max HP, but have -50% Redeployment Time.

relic_167.name: Reversed Pocket Watch
relic_167.description: A rusty pocket watch made with unknown materials, its hands ticking backwards. You can't figure out how to wind it up, or how to take it apart. How strange...

relic_168.name: 'Hand Gun'
relic_168.description: The severed skeletal hand is tightly clutching onto this large-caliber firearm. Who did it belong to? What happened to the owner of this severed hand? And how did all of this happen?
relic_168.usage: All friendly units have -3 DP Cost and gain +5% ATK, DEF, and Max HP. The adventure will head towards a different ending.

relic_169.name: Heavy Metal Chest
relic_169.description: This thick, heavy metal chest has seriously delayed your schedule, but you don't want to discard it for whatever reason. Maybe you're interested in seeing what's inside.
relic_169.usage: All friendly units have +2 DP Cost.

relic_170.name: Pitch-Black Key
relic_170.description: You're very surprised to find that this exquisitely-shaped key is made of Originium. What kind of processing technique could make such an intricate key?
relic_170.usage: All friendly units have +3% ATK, DEF, and Max HP.

relic_171.name: Auspex
relic_171.description: A special instrument made by a mysterious society in Columbia. This spherical device made of Originium crystals can detect the topography within dozens of meters around it. How magical.

relic_172.name: Super Premium Sofa
relic_172.description: 'The most comfortable sofa in all of Terra,' 'Lying on it will make you forget all the troubles of life,' 'A must-have for leisurely travel.' ...All these ads are suspiciously exaggerated.
relic_172.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 90 Operators (excluding starting Operators).

relic_173.name: Stereo Projector
relic_173.description: This projector will generate a holographic humanoid clone that is hard to distinguish unless you look closely. May come in handy if trying to mislead the enemy, but don't use it to play a prank...

relic_174.name: An Old Refrigerator
relic_174.description: An old refrigerator that has long run out of juice. However, hiding in it may protect you from many dangers, like even the most dangerous Originium bombs. That's how they do it in the movies.

relic_175.name: Personal Refuge
relic_175.description: Mama John's, a Columbian technology company, provides personal protective services to explorers, but any explorers with the money to afford that kind of service probably wouldn't still be doing that job.

relic_176.name: Void Field Capacitor
relic_176.description: A mysterious device of unknown origin, found in a Rhodes Island warehouse. Does not require Originium for its power supply. When activated, it generates an invisible barrier around the user.

relic_177.name: Water Boiler
relic_177.description: Some people often use the water boiler in the Rhodes Island Office to cook instant noodles in the middle of the night. That's not a very healthy lifestyle...
relic_177.usage: Immediately gain +2 Objective HP and +1 Hope.

relic_178.name: The 'Bad Guy' Is Here!
relic_178.description: This transport aircraft integrates all of Rhodes Island's cutting-edge technology, guaranteeing that your journey will be as smooth as a springtime outing in the wilds.
relic_178.usage: All friendly units have +35% ATK, +35% DEF, and +45% Max HP.

relic_179.name: Demonblood
relic_179.description: The essence from a certain bloodline, plus a touch of a unique Originium derivative... Just flipping the cap of the bottle open is enough to become a culprit of bloodshed.
relic_179.usage: All enemy units have +20% ATK, DEF, and Max HP.

relic_180.name: Frozen Claw
relic_180.description: Even though explorers such as Magallan challenged this pure white land from generation to generation, there are still countless mysteries... and terrifying truths buried beneath the eternal tundra.
relic_180.usage: All enemy units have +12% ATK, DEF, and Max HP; Boss units gain an additional +16% ATK, +16% DEF, and +36% Max HP.

relic_181.name: Witch King's Twishorn
relic_181.description: O, Great Witch King, you have cast your shadow across this land! Your corruption has flooded the Spires! You have died, your Arts have faded, and Leithania will no longer fear you!
relic_181.usage: All enemy units have +12% ATK, DEF, and Max HP; Entering a new node decreases Objective HP by 1 (cannot be reduced beneath 1 this way).

relic_182.name: Whispers of the Shallows
relic_182.description: A flower commonly found on the cliffs near the seas in Iberia. This one, however, is stained with colors that defy common sense. Listen to its whispers, the way it rejects hope, and know that even flowers and plants succumb to madness.
relic_182.usage: All enemy units have +8% ATK, DEF, and Max HP; 4-star and above Operators cost +1 Hope when recruited.

ro_n_1_1.name: Roadside Robber
ro_n_1_1.description: You've been accosted by crossbow-wielding robbers, being shot at from all directions.

ro_n_1_2.name: Pack of Beasts
ro_n_1_2.description: The ruffians have released their war hounds to attack your defenses.

ro_n_1_3.name: Sea of Fire
ro_n_1_3.description: You've encountered an enemy raid, and unfortunately for you, they even brought artillery support.

ro_n_2_1.name: Infiltrate and Outrange
ro_n_2_1.description: The cunning enemy has closed the gap with their stealthy vanguards, and you notice arrows flying at you from the distance.

ro_n_2_2.name: Beast Tamer
ro_n_2_2.description: Be careful - the ferocity of the enemy combatants, combined with the wiles of the beasts they control, will prove to be a dangerous assault to withstand.

ro_n_2_3.name: Wandering Evil
ro_n_2_3.description: Blocking your way is a bulky figure, circling around a pillar deliriously. Combat is all but inevitable.

ro_n_3_1.name: Assault
ro_n_3_1.description: The enemy launched an attack on you while you were resting, and you must figure out how to deploy your limited forces effectively. <@rolv.rem>Natural DP regeneration rate is decreased, and tiles do not have ranged/melee restrictions.</>

ro_n_3_2.name: Sarkaz Raid
ro_n_3_2.description: You've been surrounded by a group of Sarkaz mercenaries, and can't help but to notice some familiar faces.<@rolv.rem>Medical Runes that can restore HP are located around the battlefield.</>

ro_n_3_3.name: Bob's Farm
ro_n_3_3.description: You've broken into a strange farm that breeds Originium slugs. The owner of the farm is very angry, but familiar-looking.

ro_n_3_4.name: Ursus Tetris
ro_n_3_4.description: The enemies attacking you are rushing forward in an organized configuration, and you can hear a familiar Ursus children's song in your ears.

ro_n_3_5.name: Valley Ambush
ro_n_3_5.description: You've been ambushed. In this dangerous valley, you must defend against snipers, support artillery, and hordes of war hounds. <@rolv.rem>When deployed, Operators immediately lose a percentage of their HP.</>

ro_n_4_1.name: Arts and Anvils
ro_n_4_1.description: You've encountered a group of well-equipped marauders sporting heavy armor, powerful weapons, peculiar Originium Arts, and auxiliary equipment. <@rolv.rem>Natural DP regeneration rate is decreased, and tiles do not have ranged/melee restrictions.</>

ro_n_4_2.name: Land of Rust and Smoke
ro_n_4_2.description: Some ruffians have attacked you under the cover of a foul smoke, blanketing the entire area with poison. <@rolv.rem> Friendly units will continually lose HP.</>

ro_n_4_3.name: Demon Hunter
ro_n_4_3.description: You've been attacked by well-trained mercenaries. Beware of their snipers and drones.

ro_n_4_4.name: Barrens Cadet
ro_n_4_4.description: A group of young Sarkaz mercenaries launched a blind assault against you. But, you feel like you've seen this scene before.

ro_n_4_5.name: Villain of the Barren Hills
ro_n_4_5.description: A large group of lawless barrens-dwellers are trying to plunder your property, and there's no need to show them mercy.

ro_n_5_1.name: Escaped Bee Colony
ro_n_5_1.description: A large number of unmanned drones have passed through your squad. Swords alone may not solve the problem.

ro_n_5_2.name: Radioactive Dust
ro_n_5_2.description: A highly toxic radioactive dust sweeps across this entire area, even eroding the ground and making it difficult to walk. <@rolv.rem> Friendly units will continually lose HP.</>

ro_n_5_3.name: Occult Gathering
ro_n_5_3.description: A few crazed Sarkaz casters and their servants are unleashing violence upon you for no reason. Fear their hatred!

ro_n_5_4.name: Ancient Ice
ro_n_5_4.description: A group of crazed people are surrounding an ancient Originium ice crystal generator, glaring angrily at you. <@rolv.rem>An Originium Ice Crystal on the battlefield continuously applies the Cold effect.</>

ro_n_5_5.name: Torrent of Fact and Fiction
ro_n_5_5.description: You've encountered a difficult opponent. Prepare to face off nigh-unstoppable strategies and undeniable anger. <@rolv.rem>Ballista turrets that deal Physical damage will appear around the battlefield.</>

ro_b_1.name: Masterless Colossus
ro_b_1.description: A masterless stone giant wanders aimlessly around the wasteland. Has he found freedom?

ro_b_2.name: Flying Thief
ro_b_2.description: A strange Columbian is flying around just to show off his jetpack. <@rolv.rem>Anti-Aircraft Runes around the battlefield increase ATK against flying units.</>

ro_b_3.name: The Abandoned
ro_b_3.description: A violent Infected has attacked you. This poor soul has lost his humanity and is warping into a monstrosity. <@rolv.rem>His ATK and ASPD increase as he continuously attacks.</>

ro_b_4.name: Wilderness Hunting Group
ro_b_4.description: You've met a group of wasteland dwellers who are hunting. The group's leader has targeted you with his crossbow — evidently, he doesn't seem to care what his prey is.

ro_b_5.name: Chilling Curse
ro_b_5.description: Cruel frost, an innocent ballad, and the curse of the endless tundras coalesce into a Frozen Catastrophe and devour everything. <@rolv.rem>An Originium Ice Crystal on the battlefield continuously applies the Cold effect.</>

ro_b_6.name: Avoid Dangerous Roads
ro_b_6.description: At the conclusion of this conspiracy and sin, a 'gravestone' awaits you. It is time to end it all. <@rolv.rem>Friendly units have greatly reduced ATK and DEF; Natural DP regeneration is greatly reduced, and Redeployment Time is doubled.</>

ro_t_1.name: Duck Lord's Taunt
ro_t_1.description: Duck Lord, the famous Columbian businessman, has challenged you, and the rewards are sure to be rich. <@rolv.rem>Active Originium tiles on the battlefield increase ATK and ASPD but drain HP over time.</>

ro_t_2.name: Duck Lord's Challenge
ro_t_2.description: Duck Lord, the famous Columbian businessman, has challenged you, and the rewards are sure to be rich. <@rolv.rem>Active Originium tiles on the battlefield increase ATK and ASPD but drain HP over time.</>

ro_t_3.name: Duck Lord's Bodyguard
ro_t_3.description: Duck Lord, the famous Columbian businessman, has brought his tough bodyguard to challenge you, and the rewards are sure to be rich. <@rolv.rem>Active Originium tiles on the battlefield increase ATK and ASPD but drain HP over time.</>

ro_ev_1.name: Rusthammer Battle
ro_ev_1.description: 'They are the conquerors of the wasteland, the avengers of civilization, the Catastrophe sweeping across the barrens. Let the land rumble as the Rusthammer drops.'

ro_ev_2.name: Fanatic Siege
ro_ev_2.description: Several aggressive and well-built thugs have surrounded you, and the situation is looking dire.

ro_e_1_1.name: Roadside Robber
ro_e_1_1.description: You've been accosted by crossbow-wielding robbers, being shot at from all directions.
ro_e_1_1.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_1_2.name: Pack of Beasts
ro_e_1_2.description: The ruffians have released their war hounds to attack your defenses.
ro_e_1_2.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_1_3.name: Sea of Fire
ro_e_1_3.description: You've encountered an enemy raid, and unfortunately for you, they even brought artillery support.
ro_e_1_3.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have greatly increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_2_1.name: Infiltrate and Outrange
ro_e_2_1.description: The cunning enemy has closed the gap with their stealthy vanguards, and you notice arrows flying at you from the distance.
ro_e_2_1.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased HP.

ro_e_2_2.name: Beast Tamer
ro_e_2_2.description: Be careful - the ferocity of the enemy combatants, combined with the wiles of the beasts they control, will prove to be a dangerous assault to withstand.
ro_e_2_2.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased ATK.

ro_e_2_3.name: Wandering Evil
ro_e_2_3.description: Blocking your way is a bulky figure, circling around a pillar deliriously. Combat is all but inevitable.
ro_e_2_3.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP. Certain enemies additionally have greatly increased ATK and HP.

ro_e_3_1.name: Assault
ro_e_3_1.description: The enemy launched an attack on you while you were resting, and you must figure out how to deploy your limited forces effectively. <@rolv.rem>Natural DP regeneration rate is decreased, and tiles do not have ranged/melee restrictions.</>
ro_e_3_1.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_3_2.name: Sarkaz Raid
ro_e_3_2.description: You've been surrounded by a group of Sarkaz mercenaries, and can't help but to notice some familiar faces.<@rolv.rem>Medical Runes that can restore HP are located around the battlefield.</>
ro_e_3_2.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK and DEF, and greatly increased HP.

ro_e_3_3.name: Bob's Farm
ro_e_3_3.description: You've broken into a strange farm that breeds Originium slugs. The owner of the farm is very angry, but familiar-looking.
ro_e_3_3.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_3_4.name: Ursus Tetris
ro_e_3_4.description: The enemies attacking you are rushing forward in an organized configuration, and you can hear a familiar Ursus children's song in your ears.
ro_e_3_4.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have greatly increased HP.

ro_e_3_5.name: Valley Ambush
ro_e_3_5.description: You've been ambushed. In this dangerous valley, you must defend against snipers, support artillery, and hordes of war hounds. <@rolv.rem>When deployed, Operators immediately lose a percentage of their HP.</>
ro_e_3_5.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Friendly Operators lose more HP upon deployment, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro_e_4_1.name: Arts and Anvils
ro_e_4_1.description: You've encountered a group of well-equipped marauders sporting heavy armor, powerful weapons, peculiar Originium Arts, and auxiliary equipment. <@rolv.rem>Natural DP regeneration rate is decreased, and tiles do not have ranged/melee restrictions.</>
ro_e_4_1.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_4_2.name: Land of Rust and Smoke
ro_e_4_2.description: Some ruffians have attacked you under the cover of a foul smoke, blanketing the entire area with poison. <@rolv.rem> Friendly units will continually lose HP.</>
ro_e_4_2.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_4_3.name: Demon Hunter
ro_e_4_3.description: You've been attacked by well-trained mercenaries. Beware of their snipers and drones.
ro_e_4_3.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro_e_4_4.name: Barrens Cadet
ro_e_4_4.description: A group of young Sarkaz mercenaries launched a blind assault against you. But, you feel like you've seen this scene before.
ro_e_4_4.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased Movement Speed and HP.

ro_e_4_5.name: Villain of the Barren Hills
ro_e_4_5.description: A large group of lawless barrens-dwellers are trying to plunder your property, and there's no need to show them mercy.
ro_e_4_5.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: More elite enemies will appear, and enemies have increased ATK and HP.

ro_e_5_1.name: Escaped Bee Colony
ro_e_5_1.description: A large number of unmanned drones have passed through your squad. Swords alone may not solve the problem.
ro_e_5_1.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_5_2.name: Radioactive Dust
ro_e_5_2.description: A highly toxic radioactive dust sweeps across this entire area, even eroding the ground and making it difficult to walk. <@rolv.rem> Friendly units will continually lose HP.</>
ro_e_5_2.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_5_3.name: Occult Gathering
ro_e_5_3.description: A few crazed Sarkaz casters and their servants are unleashing violence upon you for no reason. Fear their hatred!
ro_e_5_3.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_5_4.name: Ancient Ice
ro_e_5_4.description: A group of crazed people are surrounding an ancient Originium ice crystal generator, glaring angrily at you. <@rolv.rem>An Originium Ice Crystal on the battlefield continuously applies the Cold effect.</>
ro_e_5_4.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

ro_e_5_5.name: Torrent of Fact and Fiction
ro_e_5_5.description: You've encountered a difficult opponent. Prepare to face off nigh-unstoppable strategies and undeniable anger. <@rolv.rem>Ballista turrets that deal Physical damage will appear around the battlefield.</>
ro_e_5_5.eliteDesc: Emergency Op Condition: Enemies have increased ATK, DEF, and HP.

zone_1.name: Honey Biscuit Cave
zone_1.description: Honey biscuits are not a form of food, but rather a conglomeration of the beautiful and sweet truth of this land. You have seen the entrance to this truth.
zone_1.endingDescription: You pass out inside the cave, and your consciousness follows the beautiful and sweet truth of this land, further and further in...

zone_2.name: Honey Biscuit Mountain Range
zone_2.description: Honey and biscuit layer upon each other endlessly, towering and steep. The mountain's summit is surrounded by an intoxicating mist.
zone_2.endingDescription: You collapsed on the mountain road paved with frosting and flour, and innumerable honey biscuits collapsed and buried you...

zone_3.name: Thousand Roads
zone_3.description: Under the pale, ashen hills, countless roads twist and spread, forming layer upon layer of interlocking pleated sheets.
zone_3.endingDescription: In the illusion of thousands of labyrinthine roads interweaving, you are lost on a long road with no end...

zone_4.name: Cloud Maze
zone_4.description: You've lost the ability to discern your location within the hazy mist. The soft, damp air surrounds you, making you lose track of the ground beneath your feet.
zone_4.endingDescription: You are floating among the clouds. Surrounded by nothing but fog and illusions, you feel lost and helpless.

zone_5.name: Fungus Temple
zone_5.description: Behind a layer of thorns, giant gray mushrooms tower high into the clouds, their ascocarp bearing the fruits of civilization. High above you, mycelium and gills interlace like a magnificent temple.
zone_5.endingDescription: A huge mushroom edifice collapses, sending an avalanche of spores crashing down towards you. You have nowhere to hide...

zone_6.name: Ancient Domain of the Empire of Consciousness
zone_6.description: You set foot upon a familiar yet unfamiliar land, where self-awareness and flights of fancy constantly merge and separate.
zone_6.endingDescription: In this ancient domain, you are caught in the infinite contemplation of the ego, superego, and id.

choice_3_1.title: It's just a little mist. I'll be fine.
choice_3_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>2</> Objective HP, but gain <@ro.get>8</> Originium Ingots.

choice_4_1.title: Attend their banquet
choice_4_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>5</> Originium Ingots, but gain <@ro.get>3</> Hope.

choice_5_1.title: Leave a small tip
choice_5_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>2</> Originium Ingots, but <@ro.get>Recruit</> one Operator (from a selection of 2 random classes).

choice_5_2.title: Leave a generous tip
choice_5_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>5</> Originium Ingots, but <@ro.get>Recruit</> one Operator.

choice_6_1.title: Come on! Let's make some noise!

choice_7_1.title: Stop and watch
choice_7_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>2</> Max Hope, but <@ro.get>gain</> a random collectible.

choice_9_1.title: Crack the code, no matter the costs.
choice_9_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>1</> Objective HP, but <@ro.get>randomly gain</> a mystery collectible.

choice_9_2.title: At least I can rest for a while

choice_10_1.title: Commission Letter
choice_10_1.description: <@ro.get>Recruit</> one Operator (from a selection of 2 random classes).

choice_10_2.title: Emergency Commission Letter
choice_10_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>8</> Originium Ingots, but <@ro.get>gain</> a Recruitment Voucher.

choice_11_1.title: Don't overthink things and help her quickly

choice_11_2.title: Looks a bit suspicious, better to stay away

choice_12_1.title: There's a chance... Give it a try?
choice_12_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Originium Ingots, with a <@ro.get>20%</> chance to gain 'that thing.'

choice_12_2.title: There's a chance... Give it a try?
choice_12_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Originium Ingots, with a <@ro.get>40%</> chance to gain 'that thing.'

choice_12_3.title: There's a chance... Give it a try?
choice_12_3.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Originium Ingots, with a <@ro.get>60%</> chance to gain 'that thing.'

choice_12_4.title: There's a chance... Give it a try?
choice_12_4.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Originium Ingots, with a <@ro.get>80%</> chance to gain 'that thing.'

choice_12_5.title: There's a chance... Give it a try?
choice_12_5.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Originium Ingots, with a <@ro.get>100%</> chance to gain 'that thing.'

choice_13_1.title: To be honest, I've never heard of that before

choice_13_2.title: Lie to him, point in a random direction

choice_13_3.title: Ask if he knows where Rhodes Island is

choice_14_1.title: A watch that ticks backwards? Buy it!
choice_14_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>all</> Originium Ingots, but <@ro.get>gain</> a collectible.

choice_14_2.title: Why so expensive if you can't get rid of it?

choice_16_1.title: Buy some supplies
choice_16_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>10</> Originium Ingots, but gain <@ro.get>8</> Objective HP.

choice_16_2.title: Buy some specialties
choice_16_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>10</> Originium Ingots, but gain <@ro.get>6</> Hope.

choice_16_3.title: Sing with them
choice_16_3.description: Lose <@ro.lose>4</> Max Hope, but gain <@ro.get>10</> Objective HP.

choice_16_4.title: Have a drink
choice_16_4.description: Lose <@ro.lose>5</> Objective HP, but gain <@ro.get>8</> Hope.

choice_16_5.title: Dance with them
choice_16_5.description: Lose <@ro.lose>5</> Objective HP, but gain <@ro.get>15</> Originium Ingots.

choice_18_1.title: Do you think you can just come and go as you please?

choice_19_1.title: Don't think you can scare me by bringing backup!

choice_19_2.title: Forget it, just buy him a soda

choice_20_1.title: Forcibly subdue the drunkard
choice_20_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Objective HP, but <@ro.get>gain</> a collectible.

choice_21_2.title: Make your request
choice_21_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>2</> Objective HP, but gain <@ro.get>3</> Hope.

choice_21_3.title: Peace and quiet is better than stirring up trouble

choice_23_3.title: It's not time to give up yet!

choice_25_1.title: They don't have any use for this box anymore

choice_26_2.title: I never should've gotten mixed up in this!

choice_27_1.title: Open it up and take a look

choice_c1_7.title: Pick up your stuff and leave

choice_c2_1.title: Come here, buy one and see what's inside
choice_c2_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>5</> Originium Ingots, with a chance to <@ro.get>gain</> a random collectible.

choice_c2_2.title: Take the contents of the box

choice_c2_3.title: Want to give it another try?

choice_c2_4.title: Pass, I don't think it's worth it

choice_blackm_1.title: Gulp down 2 bottles
choice_blackm_1.description: Lose <@ro.lose>2</> Objective HP, but gain <@ro.get>6</> Originium Ingots.

choice_blackm_2.title: Knock back 3 bottles
choice_blackm_2.description: Lose <@ro.lose>3</> Objective HP, but gain a <@ro.get>random recruitment permit</>.

choice_blackm_3.title: Absolutely smash 6 bottles
choice_blackm_3.description: Lose <@ro.lose>6</> Objective HP, but <@ro.get>gain</> a random collectible.

choice_startbuff_4.title: Purchase a collectible
choice_startbuff_4.description: Lose <@ro.lose>all</> Originium Ingots, but <@ro.get>gain</> a random collectible.

choice_startbuff_5.title: Reclaim loot
choice_startbuff_5.description: Lose <@ro.lose>1</> Max Hope, but <@ro.get>gain</> a random collectible.

scene_1_enter.title: Camp
scene_1_enter.description: The long journey has exhausted your team, and you have no choice but to stop and set up camp. Gazing out into the distant scenery, your thoughts drift back to all your companions eagerly awaiting news of your victorious return. All of this seems to have been worth it.

scene_1_1.title: Camp
scene_1_1.description: You feel your thoughts settle down, but a flame-like resolve smolders silently within you as you rest, up until your eyes open again. You know that you are ready.

scene_2_enter.title: Rhodes Island Field Personnel
scene_2_enter.description: You met a team of Rhodes Island Operators who were performing a field recon mission. You greeted each other, and the other party warmly shared their extra supplies with you.

scene_2_1.title: Rhodes Island Field Personnel
scene_2_1.description: You accepted their kindness, as the road ahead is still very long.

scene_3_enter.title: Miasmic Woods
scene_3_enter.description: You come across a dense forest shrouded in mist. The very air is unpleasant and assaults the nostrils. Through the suffocating miasma, you notice some supplies scattered in a pit of mud surrounded by trees. Who knows what hapless soul left these here?

scene_3_1.title: Miasmic Woods
scene_3_1.description: The noxious mist corrodes your skin, and the thorny woods twitch and lash out at you. Now, you understand why someone would leave all these supplies behind.

scene_3_2.title: Miasmic Woods
scene_3_2.description: There's no need to endanger yourself over this.

scene_4_enter.title: Travel Companion Store
scene_4_enter.description: You hear the sound of ringing bells from a Kjerag caravan. Even here, the snowflakes from their distant hometown seem to protect them. On this not-too-chilly night, they stop to set up camp, and the atmosphere fills with merriment much like a local market. The caravan guard spots your team and recognizes you, and the owner of the caravan raises a glass to you.

scene_4_1.title: Travel Companion Store
scene_4_1.description: Amidst clanging cups and shared platters, your two parties finalize some friendly trades and business deals. At dawn, you cordially bid farewell. This romantic party has brought many benefits to everyone.

scene_4_2.title: Travel Companion Store
scene_4_2.description: The heavy burden of responsibility weighs down upon your shoulders, and you know that the other party bears no ill will. But because of this, you know that you can't get these peaceful people involved in the trouble that you may bring. This is a shared consensus among adventurers.

scene_5_enter.title: Messenger Recruitment
scene_5_enter.description: You arrive at a messenger post, where messengers from all across the world stop to rest. At an information exchange hub, you decide to commission a messenger in order to appropriately adjust your deployment strategy and squad composition.

scene_5_1.title: Messenger Recruitment
scene_5_1.description: MountainDash Logistics has the most stable and widespread delivery routes. You'll soon get the results you hope for.

scene_5_2.title: Messenger Recruitment
scene_5_2.description: A more sophisticated contact network provides more possibilities for dispatching operators. Money can open the door to many things, a fact that you know well.

scene_5_3.title: Messenger Recruitment
scene_5_3.description: There is much work that needs to be done still, and no time to waste tarrying here.

scene_6_enter.title: Brawl Site
scene_6_enter.description: You see a group of ferocious-looking, burly locals arguing with each other. When you walk by, you find out that they are arguing over 'who has the most beautiful tail in the rainforest.' The argument devolves into a massive brawl, and it is quite the scene to behold.

scene_6_1.title: Brawl Site
scene_6_1.description: You gleefully rush into the brawl. There's nothing more fun than fighting.

scene_6_2.title: Brawl Site
