scene_6_2.description: The fact that anyone would fight over this is nonsense. These are the most inane people you've ever witnessed in all your years.

scene_7_enter.title: Massive Skull
scene_7_enter.description: Before you looms a massive skull of terrifying proportions. A single tooth is as big as an entire car. The entire skull is half-buried in the ground, and everything under that seems to have gone missing. Just witnessing this scene before you makes the vastness of time and space tumble around within your mind. 'Death' cannot even adequately describe this legacy of the past. What kind of creature was this ? Or rather, was this even a creature?

scene_7_1.title: Massive Skull
scene_7_1.description: It seems to still be alive. No, it indeed is dead. Or rather, it no longer exists. When you look at the ruined camp underneath the skull, you are struck with the realization that this once-great existence is now nothing more than shelter from the elements for travelers.

scene_7_2.title: Massive Skull
scene_7_2.description: These creatures that once roamed the land... Where have they all gone?

scene_8_enter.title: Bearer of Tales
scene_8_enter.description: You see a muddied man sitting on a stump with a melancholic expression, his leather jacket short a sleeve. You exchange a few words with him and learn his story: The Originium pump in his hometown was damaged, so he ran around looking for parts to repair the pump with. However, he was eventually driven out of his hometown due to contracting Oripathy during that process.

scene_8_1.title: Bearer of Tales
scene_8_1.description: 'And now, my story comes to an end.' The sorrowful man gives you his weapon and walks back into the vast wasteland, leaving only the view of his back.

scene_9_enter.title: Tactical Supplies
scene_9_enter.description: You see a huge locked chest with the 'Rhodes Island Logistics' logo upon it. It looks like Rhodes Island dropped off some field supplies for operators on the front lines, but you don't know the password. The chest is huge, probably weighing two tons, and seems impossible to open.

scene_9_1.title: Tactical Supplies
scene_9_1.description: You tried your best and finally managed to get the chest open, but there were only a few personal items inside. At this time, two elite operators rush to the scene and stare at you, wide-eyed with surprise. You realize that maybe you should not have disturbed this chest.

scene_9_2.title: Tactical Supplies
scene_9_2.description: You hide in the large chest's shade, enjoying the pleasantries of life. After all, slacking off during work hours is a lifestyle.

scene_10_enter.title: Intrepid Messenger
scene_10_enter.description: You see a burly man with a strong physique and hearty smile approach you, a pack beast slung over his shoulders. After asking about it, you realize that this man is a messenger. The beast was a gift from his son, but he thought that the pack beast was walking too slowly. It dawns upon you that you can perhaps entrust this person to deliver your message.

scene_10_1.title: Intrepid Messenger
scene_10_1.description: The other party accepts your request and sets off, the pack beast still slung over his shoulder.

scene_10_2.title: Intrepid Messenger
scene_10_2.description: You pay a little extra to the brawny man, and he clearly understands your intent. He rushes away with vigor in his step, leaving only the sad cries of the pack beast.

scene_11_enter.title: Damsel in Distress
scene_11_enter.description: You hear someone calling for help in the distance, and as you rush towards the voice, you find a Cautus girl with her leg caught by a metal weight that had fallen. She sees you and desperately begs for help. Why is this young girl alone in the wilderness?

scene_11_1.title: Damsel in Distress
scene_11_1.description: When you approach, the Cautus girl stands up with a smirk and draws her weapon. At the same time, a group of sturdily-built men emerge from behind the ruins.

scene_11_2.title: Damsel in Distress
scene_11_2.description: The other party gets back on their feet, cursing you under their breath as they watch you leave. Sure enough, it's better to stay vigilant.

scene_12_enter.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_enter.description: You see a rusty and battered contraption standing alone in the barrens, almost all the coating on its surface worn away save for a few still-legible words: 'One-in-five chance of winning a mystery prize!' However, considering that the beverages in the machine are sold out, you're not sure if that mystery prize is still in there.

scene_12_1.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_1.description: The machine says 'SOLD OUT,' but your money is not returned.

scene_12_2.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_2.description: The machine says 'SOLD OUT,' but your money is not returned.

scene_12_3.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_3.description: The machine says 'SOLD OUT,' but your money is not returned.

scene_12_4.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_4.description: The machine says 'SOLD OUT,' but your money is not returned.

scene_12_5.title: Odd Vending Machine
scene_12_5.description: The machine shakes violently before spitting out a heavy metal can.

scene_13_enter.title: Lost Victorian Knight
scene_13_enter.description: You met a Victorian knight who wanders the land with his servant. For some reason, the servant is banging two coconut shells together as he walks, making a strange sound. He asks if you've ever heard of something called the 'Sacred Originium Grenade.'

scene_13_1.title: Lost Victorian Knight
scene_13_1.description: The other party thanks you for your honesty before giving you half a coconut shell and then wandering off in a random direction.

scene_13_2.title: Lost Victorian Knight
scene_13_2.description: The other party thanks you for your honesty before giving you half a coconut shell and then wandering off in the direction you pointed.

scene_13_3.title: Lost Victorian Knight
scene_13_3.description: The other party is stunned, blindly pointing in a direction before leaving with the servant in tow.

scene_14_enter.title: Legend of the Pocket Watch
scene_14_enter.description: In a dark cave lives a mad Sarkaz. He mumbles endlessly about things that never happened, punching and kicking at his own shadow. He insists that since a Sankta took the Key, all clocks and watches have lost their meaning. He shows you some broken clock dials, bemoaning the fact that they can no longer be sold.

scene_14_1.title: Legend of the Pocket Watch
scene_14_1.description: The thing about money is, it's only meaningful when spent... Or something like that.

scene_14_2.title: Legend of the Pocket Watch
scene_14_2.description: 'If this thing is useful, then I would eat it!'

scene_15_enter.title: Rusthammer Battle
scene_15_enter.description: While struggling across the Sargon Desert, you encounter armed forces in the process of attacking a nobleman's caravan. The group, Rusthammer, recognizes you as an enemy just from seeing your equipment and attire. Now, their ballistae are pointed at you.

scene_15_1.title: Rusthammer Battle
scene_15_1.description: Rhodes Island has no reason to condone their reckless behavior, even less so if their violence is directed at you.

scene_15_2.title: Rusthammer Battle
scene_15_2.description: You understand the importance of avoiding conflict. With too little information, there is no reason to involve yourself with barbaric thugs that are running rampant.

scene_16_enter.title: Black Procession
scene_16_enter.description: The sky is gloomy and the thick air hangs low. You look towards the horizon, where a disorganized but massive team is slowly advancing in the distance. They are wearing strange black outfits and beating out arrhythmic songs using primitive instruments. The participants in this parade shout out slogans in a language you cannot understand. This is the Sarkaz's Black Procession and the true origin of the Requiem Festival.

scene_16_1.title: Black Procession
scene_16_1.description: It is said that bad luck befalls those who participate in the Black Procession, so it would be best to leave.

scene_16_2.title: Black Procession
scene_16_2.description: A vampire hands you a vial of an unpleasant potion.

scene_16_3.title: Black Procession
scene_16_3.description: A Sarkaz caster hands you a warped pendant.

scene_16_4.title: Black Procession
scene_16_4.description: This is a strange song, and you are only able to hum along with the melody. However, you suddenly make a decision.

scene_16_5.title: Black Procession
scene_16_5.description: You take the potion from the Sarkaz's hands and drink its contents. The potion tastes terrible, but you feel a lot more relaxed afterwards.

scene_16_6.title: Black Procession
scene_16_6.description: You dance with the people of Sarkaz, your body's movements melding and fluctuating with your induced state of relaxation.

scene_17_enter.title: A duck
scene_17_enter.description: You feel as if someone has been following you since last night, but every time you look back, you don't see anything. There's something abnormal about this. After a crude ambush, you discover the true identity of your stalker — a strangely dressed... duck?

scene_17_1.title: A duck
scene_17_1.description: Let's beat it up first and then talk later.

scene_17_2.title: A duck
scene_17_2.description: It dares not bite me anyway.

scene_18_enter.title: That same duck
scene_18_enter.description: A presumptuous-sounding duck stands before you, and you have no idea where it came from, and he acts as if he has always been right next to you. He chatters ceaselessly, which you find extremely annoying. He says that the two of you have a mutual friend, but based upon his behavior, he seems only interested in messing with you. Soon, he drags his briefcase off and darts away.

scene_18_1.title: That same duck
scene_18_1.description: You decide to chase after him— Wait, why did he 'run' over there? Err, can you even call that 'running?'

scene_18_2.title: That same duck
scene_18_2.description: You're trying to think of who that mutual friend might be. Unfortunately, this pompous, self-aggrandizing way of speaking does remind you of a certain... respectable big boss.

scene_19_enter.title: A... duck?
scene_19_enter.description: In front of you... is that same duck from before, mocking you maliciously. This time, he has a burly Ursus bodyguard standing behind him. Your vision begins to be obscured by duck feathers and you lose the ability to move. You hear the sound of droplets of water breaking, sweating profusely like prey falling into a hunter's trap... And then you are dragged back to reality by a mocking laughter. The duck gestures, and the Ursus bodyguard begins to charge straight at you.

scene_19_1.title: A... duck?
scene_19_1.description: For whatever reason, you begin to feel that chasing him around beating him is your common obligation. He is more than happy to oblige, and even says that he'll prepare a more generous gift for you next time. The purpose of making money is to lead a happy life!

scene_19_2.title: A... duck?
scene_19_2.description: To be honest, you don't think that there's actually any bad blood between you and this duck. Upon him still lingers the peculiar muddy smell of fresh reeds — perhaps this is is no ordinary 'duck'...

scene_20_enter.title: 'Barside Entertainment'
scene_20_enter.description: You find several members of the L.G.D. who have arrived at a tavern after crossing mountains and wading through rivers. They are in the process of getting absolutely smashed, and the only one still sober asks you for a small favor, promising to compensate you. You look at the another member of the L.G.D. who is now singing while completely naked, and start to have serious doubts.

scene_20_1.title: 'Barside Entertainment'
scene_20_1.description: What a pain in the ass. After the job, the L.G.D. member secretly gives you a small pendant. It looks a bit familiar somehow?

scene_20_2.title: 'Barside Entertainment'
scene_20_2.description: The other party throws his wallet to you as a form of tribute to the first rays of applause he received on his road to 'artistry.' Hopefully, he won't regret it later.

scene_21_enter.title: Exhausted Inspector's Journey
scene_21_enter.description: A member of the L.G.D. stands before you, probably some kind of inspector. He wears glasses and speaks in a polite tone, hesitating several times before asking to speak with you. You notice the embarrassment in his eyes even through the glasses, and he finally tells you that he's looking for several colleagues who left on business trips and haven't been heard from since. He asks for your help and promises to compensate you for your effort.

scene_21_1.title: Exhausted Inspector's Journey
scene_21_1.description: The person in charge strokes his glasses, the expression on his face convincing you that there is indeed a connection between these two things. He gives you a large sum of money and tells you to keep quiet.

scene_21_2.title: Exhausted Inspector's Journey
scene_21_2.description: The unexpected investigation takes a lot of time, but you earned the inspector's recognition as well as some manpower. This is a win-win situation.

scene_21_3.title: Exhausted Inspector's Journey
scene_21_3.description: Of course, you are not obligated to deal with the drunken L.G.D. members. It's better to use this time to let the operators get a good night's sleep, right?

scene_22_enter.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale I
scene_22_enter.description: You encounter a gravely wounded bounty hunter in the wilderness. Strangely, he is not holding a wanted poster or a treasure map, but rather a strange shop flyer. He places a gold coin in your hand, but fades away before he is able to say anything.

scene_22_1.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale I
scene_22_1.description: In order to secure a proper burial for the deceased bounty hunter, you are heavily extorted by the only village within hundreds of miles.

scene_22_2.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale I
scene_22_2.description: Why didn't he exchange the gold coin he gave you for cash? In any case, you decide to do just that.

scene_23_enter.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_enter.description: You follow the bounty hunter's trail of blood deeper down the road and find several abandoned vehicles that have been brutally mauled. There are signs that a battle unfolded here between mercenaries and bounty hunters. Obviously, this place is full of danger, and danger always smells of opportunity.

scene_23_1.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_1.description: You pass through a littered battlefield and see a hidden tunnel behind an abandoned vehicle. You are not sure what lies on the other side of that tunnel, but the danger is irresistible.

scene_23_2.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_2.description: You come to the realization that the bounty hunters planted traps everywhere, and the only way you'll be able to push forward is to sustain some cuts and bruises.

scene_23_3.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_3.description: In a pile of gravel not far away, you notice a nondescript mark that is easily overlooked. After a little bit of digging, you pull up a strange treasure map.

scene_23_4.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_4.description: Perhaps you inherited the romance-seeking, adventurous spirit of the bounty hunters, or maybe you were simply overcome with curiosity and greed. Whatever the case, you still decide to follow the map.

scene_23_5.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale II
scene_23_5.description: Maybe there's nothing here at all? This is the life of a bounty hunter, and that life is not for you.

scene_24_enter.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale III
scene_24_enter.description: The name of the city and shop written on the treasure map are both fictitious, and the coordinates have only taken you in a big loop. In the end, there's nothing here but this banana forest! The names of these places seem to be little more than babbles from a Sami nursery rhyme, and as you ponder the reason for why that might be, the temperature suddenly starts to drop.

scene_24_1.title: Non-Existent Fairy Tale III
scene_24_1.description: You uncover an invisible city and an invisible person — they only existed within the fragments of these clues. This may be a trap, or perhaps the signal of a frigid specter's coming.

scene_25_enter.title: After the Deathmatch
scene_25_enter.description: In the wilderness, you find a throng of mercenaries engulfing themselves in conflict. Before long, the breath of life has departed from all of them. You inspect the remains of these hapless fellows and find a heavy metal box with an extremely strong lock on it, but no key to go along with it.

scene_25_1.title: After the Deathmatch
scene_25_1.description: You turn around and look at the fallen bodies, then back at the metal box in your hand. You're starting to get a bad feeling about this.

scene_25_2.title: After the Deathmatch
scene_25_2.description: Although many people complain about life in the city, stuff like this happens when they decide to leave.

scene_26_enter.title: Looming Disaster
scene_26_enter.description: You insert the black key into the keyhole of the metallic box, and the large lock clicks open. However, its contents make you shudder. You see a severed hand clutching a Laterano guardian gun, the flesh long having decomposed into bone. No matter what you do, you cannot remove it from the weapon. You seem to have accidentally landed yourself in the middle of a terrible conspiracy.

scene_26_1.title: Looming Disaster
scene_26_1.description: You've heard about this before. In the wastelands far from the nomadic cities, sin and desire breed and spread, and unadulterated violence follows. You will not be able to stay out of it this time.

scene_26_2.title: Looming Disaster
scene_26_2.description: You throw the metal box and its contents into a dumpster. Though you are in a lot of trouble, it is not too late to escape.

scene_27_enter.title: A Toaster
scene_27_enter.description: You see an overturned animal-drawn wagon. Both the driver and the animal are missing. There is nothing left on the wagon except a rusty toaster. Under the scorching sun, you notice something that the light is reflecting on.

scene_27_1.title: A Toaster
scene_27_1.description: You find a lot of valuable things hidden inside the toaster. Is it true that mastering the art of toaster repair is a crucial skill to surviving in the wilderness?

scene_28_enter.title: Teller of Tales
scene_28_enter.description: You set up camp under the cover of night. Across from you sits a special passerby who calls himself a storyteller. He shares many interesting stories with you: 'Upon the tundras of the frigid North, the ancient Wendigo bloodline fought for the motherland against terrible, warped demons.' 'Under the magnificent tower, twin princesses defeated the witch-king and saved their people.' 'When a great silence fell across the city of gold, the people of faith stepped forward...' 'There once lived a man in an uninhabited volcano...'

scene_28_1.title: Teller of Tales
scene_28_1.description: This land is full of cruelty and indifference, but behind all the devastation are numerous stories full of strength and humanity. Are these stories real?

scene_rest_enter.title: Safe House
scene_rest_enter.description: Rhodes Island's facilities in various regions are maintained by specialized personnel. From the day you departed to the present, you've encountered harsh environments, formidable enemies, and countless bizarre incidents. It is time to sharpen your blade, repair your equipment, and reflect upon your experiences in order to meet greater challenges.

scene_rest_1.title: Safe House
scene_rest_1.description: You spend a quiet and comfortable night, and yet another page turns on Terra's calendar.

scene_rest_2.title: Safe House
scene_rest_2.description: Terra is full of unforeseen dangers, and now is not the time to seek a peaceful respite.

scene_rest_3.title: Safe House
scene_rest_3.description: You narrate some inspiring past events, mixing your account with some humorous stories. Everyone remains optimistic about their next adventure.

scene_rest_4.title: Safe House
scene_rest_4.description: After counting the available supplies and rearranging your squad composition, there seems to be room for additional manpower.

scene_c1_enter.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_enter.description: You notice a group of barrens dwellers gathered around a cage of scrap iron and wood. The cage reads 'Originium Slug Race,' and it would appear that the people here are betting on the creatures inside. A disfigured Liberi asks if you want to try your luck.

scene_c1_1.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_1.description: A mysterious force compels you back to the betting stand.

scene_c1_2.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_2.description: You place your bet on an Originium slug, and it squirms across the race in a totally normal manner. Though your slug is not the last to finish, you still lose.

scene_c1_3.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_3.description: You place your bet on an Originium slug. This agile critter slid past the competition and took a good ranking. Not bad, not bad!

scene_c1_4.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_4.description: You place your bet on an Originium slug. This angry-looking bug didn't even participate in the match, instead walloping the other slugs present. The scene was very chaotic, much to your delight.

scene_c1_5.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_5.description: You place your bet on an Originium slug. The cunning creature takes first place by using shortcuts and other 'unconventional' methods, allowing you to walk away with the grand prize of this competition.

scene_c1_6.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_6.description: You place your bet on an Originium slug, but the fat creature was basically too lazy to move and lost the race without much fanfare.

scene_c1_7.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_7.description: One of the people there accuses another of being a cheater, and soon the hurled insults turn into throwing fists. Chaos ensues.

scene_c1_8.title: Originium Slug Race
scene_c1_8.description: You've been staring at the track for ten minutes, and these Originium slugs have only made it halfway around the track. You have more important things to do...

scene_c2_enter.title: Eccentric Merchant
scene_c2_enter.description: You see a Zalak man wearing soiled formal attire. He is standing on a pile of boxes, peddling his wares to the barrens dwellers. The man claims that these boxes contain rare goods obtained through 'special means,' but you notice that upon these boxes are printed the trademarks of Columbia's large military contractors and logistics companies...

scene_c2_1.title: Eccentric Merchant
scene_c2_1.description: Although you have a premonition that something is wrong, you still have a bit of fun drawing from the box.

scene_c2_2.title: Eccentric Merchant
scene_c2_2.description: There are some useful tools inside the box! You've earned it! Too bad for the other guy!

scene_c2_3.title: Eccentric Merchant
scene_c2_3.description: There are only suspicious reagents and useless mechanical parts inside the box. You feel a bit disappointed.

scene_c2_4.title: Eccentric Merchant
scene_c2_4.description: The fact that you don't know where these things came from is quite problematic...

scene_blackm_enter.title: Drinking Contest
scene_blackm_enter.description: It's common knowledge that challenging Durins to a drinking contest can't possibly go well. What I'm saying is, they get a bit crazy.

scene_blackm_1.title: Drinking Contest
scene_blackm_1.description: Your courage has earned the applause of others, and they pass you a little bit of money.

scene_blackm_2.title: Drinking Contest
scene_blackm_2.description: The Durins cheer you on as you tag large swigs of booze and give you some gifts afterwards.

scene_blackm_3.title: Drinking Contest
scene_blackm_3.description: The Durins are dumbfounded by your alcohol tolerance, and readily recognize that you've earned your prize.

scene_blackm_4.title: Drinking Contest
scene_blackm_4.description: You turn and leave, letting the Durins continue to enjoy themselves at their party.

scene_treasure_enter.title: Supplies
scene_treasure_enter.description: A gift from a friendly local, a box of unclaimed goods, a chest half-buried in the soil, and a large piece of damaged industrial wreckage... You've been given supplies, and best of all, it's completely free.

scene_treasure_1.title: Supplies
scene_treasure_1.description: Sometimes, you do get something for nothing. Don't think too much about it, and just accept it.

scene_startbuff_enter.title: Rewards
scene_startbuff_enter.description: Your last adventure broke through at least two additional levels of difficulty. This time, you'll be able to receive more assistance from Rhodes Island.

easy.name: Joyous Wandering
easy.difficultyDesc: Operators are stronger, but cannot unlock units and collectibles, and rewards are reduced by 50%.

normal.name: Outfitted Attendance
normal.difficultyDesc: Normal mode, recommended for all players.
normal.ruleDesc: Just an ordinary day for Rhodes Island's operators.

difficult.name: Treacherous Road
difficult.difficultyDesc: Play through a more difficult adventure for 20% increased rewards.
difficult.ruleDesc: Suffer a random curse, and get a minor collectible.

ro_ending_1.name: Dust of Dreams
ro_ending_1.description: The fungimist has lifted, and Ceobe returns to reality. However, those memories of thrilling adventures linger like a dream, nestling within the Perro's heart.

ro_ending_2.name: Perplexed Traveler
ro_ending_2.description: The fungimist has lifted, and Ceobe returns to reality. Those profound and thrilling adventures have left their marks in an intruiging way. Perhaps not everything was merely a dream?

ro_ending_3.name: Return to the Wilds
ro_ending_3.description: Ceobe touched a fragment of this world's truth, and the fungimist intertwines with her soul, returning all to the wild.

0.name: Lovely money!
0.description: Wealth is the ability to control society's resources. Ceobe doesn't know much about society, but knows what resources are — delicious.

1.name: Lovely money!
1.description: You left with a small Originium ingot. It should be enough to buy some sugar.

2.name: Lovely money!
2.description: You left with a few Originium ingots. It's definitely enough for a loaf of bread.

3.name: Lovely money!
3.description: You left with a pouch of Originium ingots. Meat will be on the menu today.

4.name: Lovely money!
4.description: You left with a huge case of Originium ingots. You could buy a diner and still have some left over.

5.name: Lovely money!
5.description: You left with several chests of... Wait, what are you even going to do with all this? Start a war?

0.name: More people!
0.description: A proper expedition requires a solid foundation of personnel and logistics. But, wouldn't you rather go on an exciting adventure with your friends in the land of dreams?

1.name: More people!
1.description: Time to play with friends! Super happy! Super safe!

2.name: More people!
2.description: Before waking up from that long dream, Rhodes Island IDs got renamed into Ceobe IDs!

0.name: Beat 'em up!
0.description: Even if you meet a terrible foe in a nightmare, just focus on the memories of your mighty companions, and the nightmare will be able to do nothing except retreat.

1.name: Beat 'em up!
1.description: Ceobe will smack the enemies around even harder now!

2.name: Beat 'em up!
2.description: Ceobe is fearless, no matter how large that pack of crazy Originium slugs!

3.name: Beat 'em up!
3.description: Even well-trained operators sigh to themselves that they're not as good as Ceobe! Praise me, praise me!

4.name: Beat 'em up!
4.description: Ceobe can charge fearlessly, even in the face of an entire army! Kay is awesome!

5.name: Beat 'em up!
5.description: Kay scared away that spooky Catastrophe cloud! What can't she do?

0.name: Go train!
0.description: The lonely Ceobe faces a lonely wilderness. In order to not be defeated by wild beasts and hunger, I'll need to get stronger! In a dream, Ceobe can even crush a city!

1.name: Go train!
1.description: Ceobe's armor is super strong! She won't get hurt!

2.name: Go train!
2.description: The other operators have all given up. Now, there's nobody to keep Kay out of the kitchen!

3.name: Go train!
3.description: Kay is going to defeat the enemies by exhausting them! Arrows and arts can't hurt her!

4.name: Go train!
4.description: Even the explosives used to test the ship's armor can't hurt Kay now! How are we supposed to test now?

5.name: Go train!
5.description: Even landslides and earthquakes can't make Ceobe feel pain! She will sleep peacefully even if meteors are destroying Terra!

0.name: Eat honey biscuits!
0.description: If Ceobe remembers properly, there are some Rhodes Island Operators who'll never get knocked down! Ceobe believes that she can just like them with enough food and sleep, so it's time for honey biscuits! *Chomp*
0.usage: All friendly units gain +0% Max HP

1.name: Eat honey biscuits!
1.description: Ceobe is growing big and strong!
1.usage: All friendly units gain +1% Max HP

2.name: Eat honey biscuits!
2.description: Eating and sleeping well makes Ceobe super healthy and strong! Even wild pack beasts can't compare to her endurance!
2.usage: All friendly units gain +2% Max HP

3.name: Eat honey biscuits!
3.description: Ceobe is tireless! Give her a honey biscuit and she can fight for seven days and nights!
3.usage: All friendly units gain +3% Max HP

4.name: Eat honey biscuits!
4.description: Kay's calories and food consumed don't match up! Kay has broken the law of conservation!
4.usage: All friendly units gain +4% Max HP

5.name: Eat honey biscuits!
5.description: 'Rest' has disappeared from Kay's dictionary! An operator suspects that her honey biscuits are actually some unknown high-energy fuel!
5.usage: All friendly units gain +5% Max HP
